description: "Education should be Free as Air and Water" - Peter Cooper On May Day, the ghost of free education's past visited the scroogely board of Cooper Union! The corporatization of our college system is ghastly. FREE Cooper Union! FREE Education for All!

title: FREE Cooper Union! FREE Education for All! (May Day 2013)
